properties.Name: LifeInsuranceClaim
properties.Description:
A demand made by the insured's beneficiary for payment of the benefits provided by the insurance policy.

The related beneficiary(s) are the Claimant(s) in this case.

Columns.Name: ClaimId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Claim.

Columns.Name: ClaimAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of the claim paid.

Columns.Name: ExaminerStatement
Columns.Description: The insurer examiner statement determining whether there is a reason to contest the claim.

Columns.Name: ReasonForContestingClaim
Columns.Description: The reason that the Claim has been contested.

Columns.Name: ContestedClaimIndicator
Columns.Description: An indicator that the associated Claim has been contested by the insurer.

Columns.Name: ElectronicClaimIndicator
Columns.Description: A digital representation of a medical bill generated by a provider or by the provider's billing agent for submission using telecommunications to a health insurance payer. Most claims are electronically submitted.

Columns.Name: InsurancePolicyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Insurance Policy.

Columns.Name: LifeInsuranceClaimTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Life Insurance Claim Type.

Columns.Name: CauseOfDeathId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Cause of Death.

Columns.Name: CatastropheId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Catastrophe.

Properties.Description:
A demand made by the insured's beneficiary for payment of the benefits provided by the insurance policy.

The related beneficiary(s) are the Claimant(s) in this case.
